text: Today I made this website! With Twitter attempting to block other platforms and things like Linktree, it seems now's the time to finally get this up and running.
I probably won't update this super often, but lately I've been trying to learn more about music production.
Over the past few weeks I wrote an entire [unofficial user manual](https://manual.synthv.info) for SynthV Studio (whew).
It was a lot of work but it's my hope that this will remove some of the barriers people face when learning to use vocal synths.
If you're a vocal synth user, please check it out!
I made a new [tier list maker thing](/tierlist) because TierMaker doesn't work the way I want it to. My app isn't a complete replacement, and there's still a lot missing, but I already prefer it.

I've expanded on the [SynthV Buyer's Guide](https://synthv.info/resource-voices#voices/ai) I've been maintaining to include a lot more information, like the most popular songs made with the software. You can also filter the list of AI voice databases now.

Dreamtonics finally released their official SynthV Studio user manual, so I've discontinued my unofficial one. It was a fun project while it lasted, but now I should have more time to dive into new programming topics, which I'm looking forward to.
I did a bit of clean-up on this website today as well, though I'm hesitant to continue work on it too much since it's based on my old JS framework that's been somewhat bodged together over the years.
